TEAMNAME_LENGTH: A team name consists of at least 5 and at most 30 characters.
USERNAME_LENGTH: A username consists of at least 5 and at most 30 characters.
CODE_ORIGIN: You'll receive the code from your quizmaster.
CODE_LENGTH: A code consists of at least 4 characters.
MEMBER_NAMES: Add the members of your team (one per line).
KICKED_OUT: You've been kicked out by the quizmaster. Click OK to go to the registration page.
KICK_OUT: Kick this team out of the game!
PASSWORD_LENGTH: A password consists of at least 2 characters.
CURRENT_TEAMS_IN_LOBBY: The following teams are waiting in the lobby:
QuestionNotInCurrentQuizSection: Question not in current quiz section.
QuizMasterUnauthorizedForGame: As a quizmaster you're not authorized for this game.
QuizMasterUnauthorizedForQuizItem: As a quizmaster you're not authorized for this quiz item.
LobbyUnavailableBecauseOfGameState: The lobby is not available now.
UnauthorizedRole: You are not authorized for this.
GameIsPausedOrFinished: The game is paused or finished. The thing you're trying to do is not allowed in these states.
TeamCantAccessQuizItemOtherThanTheCurren: You can only view the current quiz item.
CONFIRM_END_GAME: Are you sure you want to end the game?
WAIT_FOR_RESUME: Wait for the game to be resumed
